Well Vegeta may be an asshole but he's a saiyan too. And a proud one at that. Do you really think that he wouldn't want to beat his opponent when they're at their stronest? And let's not forget that Piccolo loves to fight just as much as Goku does. But with him it is less justifiable. Because he's more pragmatic than Goku or Vegeta.

Well unless it's played for comedy purposes, people doing the realistic and sensible thing in a story tends to be kind of boring. Just imagine how many dead magical girls there would be if the villains didn't bother to wait for them to finish their transformation sequences before every fight.

Well yeah. You all know the story. Akira Toriyama wanted to end DBZ at the Frieza saga then his editor over at Jump showed up at his house in a dumptruck full of money and was all like "Eeeehhhhhh?" And Toriyama's like "Fiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiine."
